web_snippets: James Daly is the Chief Executive Officer of Allianz Trade Americas, the world leader in trade credit insurance. With 20 years of experience in the field.
Allianz Trade has announced changes to its regional leadership teams, with James Daly, CEO of Allianz Trade in the Americas, set to retire on June 30, 2025.
